features.name: False Appearance
features.description: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

features.name: Languages
features.description: one language known by its creator

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
